name: System Purpose Declaration
legal_text: A general description of the AI system including its intended purpose and the persons developing, deploying or using the system shall be provided.
technical_translation: Document system purpose, end-users, and stakeholder roles in a structured format.

name: Risk Control Process Overview
legal_text: High-risk AI systems shall be developed and implemented on the basis of a risk management system.
technical_translation: Define a documented risk workflow, including detection triggers, mitigation strategies, and responsible roles.

name: Human Oversight Log
legal_text: High-risk AI systems shall be designed and developed in such a way that natural persons can effectively oversee the AI system.
technical_translation: Maintain audit logs of human interventions or override actions triggered during AI operation.
